text: aur Allah taâ€™ala hee ke paas hai ghayb ki kunjiya (qazaane) un ko koyi nahi jaanta ba-juz Allah ke, aur wo tamaam chizo ko jaanta hai jo kuch qushki mein hai aur jo kuch daryaao mein hai aur koyi patta nahi girta magar wo us ko bhi jaanta hai aur koyi daana zameen ke taareek hisso mein nahi padta aur na koyi tar aur na koi khushk cheez girti hai magar ye sab kitaab mubeen mein hai
